alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:19AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bonner, western Shoshone and northeastern Kootenai Counties through 1045 AM PDT... At 1018 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fourth Of July Pass, or 8 miles southeast of Coeur d`Alene, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coeur d`Alene, Fourth Of July Pass, Fernan Lake Village, Beauty Creek Campground, Magee Ranger Station, Wolf Creek Campground, and Bayview. This includes Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 14 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle
